channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Numerous potholes, 7th September
item.description:
There are still many potholes on this road, despite some of them being mended a few months back.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 219a BATH, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Has been here for over a week

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 219a BATH, Cheltenham

item.title: Drain cover missing, 7th September
item.description:
Been missing for over a month now. I saw this being attended to by the council and they placed a traffic cone over the open drain. Remains a problem
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): St. James Cottage Saint James' Square, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole outside my house, 7th September
item.description:
I recently reported two potholes outside my house that had been left in an oily mess and now on returning from the half marathon on Sunday, with friends, one of them had oil on the bottom of their shoes which has subsequently gone onto a rug and I can't get it out. The lane is becoming a mess and I have to drive round it to avoid getting on my drive, please sort immediately Geraldine Prosser, Harbury Spring Lane Prestbury GL52 3BW
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Shaw Green Lane, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard down and litter building up, 6th September
item.description:
This bollard on Edinburgh Place presents a trip hazard, is unsightly and has gathered lots of litter. Please can someone fix it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 60 Edinburgh Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of glass on road, 6th September

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 30 Bath Road, Cheltenham
